definitions.definition: the action or fact of leaving one's job and ceasing to work.
the period of one's life after leaving one's job and ceasing to work.
examples: he spent much of his retirement traveling in Europe

definitions.definition: the action or fact of ceasing to play a sport competitively.
the withdrawal of a jury from the courtroom to decide their verdict.
the period of time during which a jury decides their verdict.

examples: he lived in retirement in Miami
Vermont, where he has a sweet country retirement
